page.title: 02CLUBS AROUND BISHOPS FROME
page.content:
WOMENS INSTITUTES: At Bishops Frome (22 members) and Fromes Hill (17 members). Meetings are held monthly in respective village halls, and include a short business discussion followed by a talk or deminstation on subjects ranging from local and natural history, travel, public life to all aspects of domestic art and craft. Social events, outings and fund-raising efforts for charity are also arranged. WI's are organised by a committee elected by the members, and are open to all women.
LUNCHEON CLUBS FOR SENIOR CITIZENS: This meets in Bishops Frome Village Hall every Tuesday, and is run under the anspices of the W.R.V.S. Lunch is prepared by one of five volunteer cooking teams and is served to an average of 30 old folk. A minibus
